Class Pokemon

java.lang.Object
pokemon.Pokemon
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnemyPokemon, PlayerPokemon
public abstract class Pokemon extends Object

      Check if a player move hit
      Parameters:

      move - the move used
      enemy - the enemy pokemon
      Returns:
      true if the player move hit the enemy
